title: Networking Essentials
description: Get a solid grasp of networking essentials with this guide. Understand protocols, routing, and network security in tech.

quiz.question: Which company played a crucial role in developing internet infrastructure through routers and switches?
What is the primary function of an IP address?
options: Uniquely identify devices on a network
quiz.answer: Uniquely identify devices on a network

quiz.question: Which networking concept is responsible for directing data traffic across networks?
What is the main purpose of network protocols?
options: To allow devices to communicate effectively
quiz.answer: To allow devices to communicate effectively

quiz.question: Which networking technology allows devices to connect without physical cables?
